trans-unit.source: Contains response information returned as a result of a peer endpoint resolution operation on the peer resolver.

When <xref:System.ServiceModel.PeerResolvers.CustomPeerResolverService.Resolve%28System.ServiceModel.PeerResolvers.ResolveInfo%29> or an implementation of <xref:System.ServiceModel.PeerResolvers.IPeerResolverContract.Resolve%28System.ServiceModel.PeerResolvers.ResolveInfo%29> is called, this object is returned to the client.
It contains the endpoints registered to the peer specified in a previous corresponding <xref:System.ServiceModel.PeerResolvers.ResolveInfo> instance sent to the peer resolver.
Instances of this class are primarily used to pass information from the resolver service to a network client of that service.
Initializes a new default instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.PeerResolvers.ResolveResponseInfo"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.PeerResolvers.ResolveResponseInfo"></xref> class with the provided set of peer endpoint addresses.
Array of <xref href="System.ServiceModel.PeerNodeAddress"></xref> objects that contain the endpoint addresses registered to the peer whose endpoints were requested in a previous resolution operation.
Gets or sets a collection of peer node addresses.

Generic list <IList> of <xref href="System.ServiceModel.PeerNodeAddress"></xref> objects that contain the endpoint addresses registered to the peer whose endpoints were requested in a previous resolution operation.
Indicates whether the body of the message containing a serialized instance of this type is correctly formed.
True if the resolution response information body is correctly-formed by the sender; false if it is not.
